org.schwering.evi.core
Class Requirement

java.lang.Object
  org.schwering.evi.core.Requirement
public class Requirement
extends java.lang.Object

Requirements define relations between modules. A module might require one or more other modules. Not only the existence but also a specific version might be required .
This class defines just one requirement, e.g. just one module required by some other module.

Note: Requirements of modules are defined in the requiring module's JAR's manifest file. Use the ModuleLoader.ATTR_MODULE_REQUIREMENTS attribute. Probably, this class is not interesting for module developers!

Version:
$Id: Requirement.java 19 2006-05-06 20:41:09Z schwering $
Author:
Christoph Schwering (mailto:schwering@gmail.com)

matches

public static boolean matches(ModuleContainer module,
                              ModuleContainer[] loaded)
Checks whether all requirements of one module are matched by the existence of a bunch of modules.

Parameters:
module - The module whose requirements are checked.
loaded - The existing modules who might satisfy the requirements.
Returns:
true if the module is satisfied.

getCause

public static RequirementException getCause(ModuleContainer module,
                                            ModuleContainer[] loaded)
Returns an exception if the modules in loaded do not satisfy the requirements of module. Otherwise, null is returned.

Parameters:
module - The module whose requirements are checked.
loaded - The existing modules that might satisfy the requirements.
Returns:
null if the module is satisfied, otherwise a RequirementException with a stupid message.
